# ||(_:_:)

**Operator**

Returns a predicate which evaluates to `true` if `left` OR `right` evaluates to `true`.

## Declaration

```swift
func || <Value>(left: QueryPredicate<Value>, right: QueryPredicate<Value>) -> QueryPredicate<Value>
```

## Comparing predicates

- **!(_:)**: Returns a predicate which evaluates to `true` if `operand` evaluates to `false`.
- **&&(_:_:)**: Returns a predicate which evaluates to `true` if `left` AND `right` evaluate to `true`.

items.description: Returns a predicate which evaluates to `true` if `operand` evaluates to `false`.
Returns a predicate which evaluates to `true` if `left` AND `right` evaluate to `true`.
